scheduled_posts.title: Beginner's Complete Blueprint: Your First 30 Days on Carnivore
scheduled_posts.author: sarah
scheduled_posts.excerpt: January brings a flood of new carnivore converts. If you're starting out, this day-by-day blueprint covers what to buy, what to expect, and how to handle the first month without overthinking it.

scheduled_posts.title: Coffee on Carnivore: The Practical Answer to the Great Debate
scheduled_posts.author: marcus
scheduled_posts.excerpt: The coffee question won't die. Strict carnivore says no. Most people drink it anyway. Here's the practical framework for deciding what's right for you without the dogma.

scheduled_posts.title: Carnivore Didn't Fix Everything: The Honest Truth About Plateaus
scheduled_posts.author: chloe
scheduled_posts.excerpt: The carnivore community is having an honest conversation right now. Not everyone gets the miracle transformation. Some people plateau. Some issues don't resolve. Here's what we're learning.

scheduled_posts.title: Medical Establishment Backlash: Why Experts Keep Attacking Carnivore
scheduled_posts.author: sarah
scheduled_posts.excerpt: Another week, another article calling carnivore dangerous. Why does mainstream nutrition keep attacking this diet? What does the research actually show? And how do you talk to your doctor about it?

scheduled_posts.title: Real 2-Week Results: What Actually Happens When You Start Carnivore
scheduled_posts.author: chloe
scheduled_posts.excerpt: I combed through hundreds of 2-week progress posts on Reddit and YouTube. Here's what typical results actually look like, not the outliers that go viral.

scheduled_posts.title: Organ Meats for Skeptics: How to Start When Liver Makes You Gag
scheduled_posts.author: marcus
scheduled_posts.excerpt: You know organ meats are nutritious. You also know they taste like dirt. Here's the practical guide to getting the benefits without suffering through the texture.

scheduled_posts.title: Meal Timing on Carnivore: Does It Actually Matter?
scheduled_posts.author: sarah
scheduled_posts.excerpt: Some carnivore advocates swear by OMAD. Others eat 3 meals a day. The research on meal timing is nuanced. Here's what actually matters for metabolic health.

scheduled_posts.title: Building Social Support When Your Family Thinks You're Crazy
scheduled_posts.author: marcus
scheduled_posts.excerpt: Your spouse thinks you're going to die. Your mother won't stop sending articles about fiber. Your coworkers make comments at every lunch. Here's how to handle the social friction of carnivore.

scheduled_posts.title: The Carnivore Community Pulse: What's Working in January 2026
scheduled_posts.author: chloe
scheduled_posts.excerpt: January brought a flood of new carnivore converts. Here's what I'm seeing across Reddit, YouTube, and Discord. The trends, the debates, and what's actually working for people.
